title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC Review
description: This RFC proposes the gathering and documentation of requirements for the ContextAwareSummarizer project. The proposal includes expected features, user personas, use cases, data sources, integration points, security considerations, performance and scalability requirements. Upon completion, this task will serve as a foundation for the subsequent development phases.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop User Context Management
description: Implement the functionality to capture and manage user context, such as role, current projects, and preferences.

title: Implement Summarization Algorithm
description: Develop the core summarization algorithm that takes into account the user's context to generate relevant summaries.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface, considering the user experience and accessibility requirements.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface based on the approved designs, integrating with the backend components.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for security, including authentication, authorization, and data protection.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the project, including user guides, developer guides, and API references.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application meets the defined requirements and quality standards.
